Container.Name: telegraf
Container.Description: Telegraf gathers metrics from your system and sends them to an InfluxDB server for storage. From InfluxDB you would typically use something like Grafana to plot the data.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/var/run/docker.sock[/b] Location of your docker socket.[br] [br] [b]docker run -t -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro -v /proc:/rootfs/proc:ro -v /etc:/rootfs/etc:ro -v /sys:/rootfs/sys:ro -v /:/rootfs:ro -v /mnt/user/appdata/telegraf/telegraf.conf:/etc/telegraf/telegraf.conf -e HOST_MOUNT_PREFIX=/rootfs -e HOST_ETC=/rootfs/etc -e HOST_PROC=/rootfs/proc -e HOST_SYS=/rootfs/sys --net="bridge" --name="telegraf" --privileged=true telegraf[/b]
Container.Overview: Telegraf sends metrics to InfluxDB. Telegraf can collect metrics about the host (in this case unRAID) and about other docker containers.
